name: Lethal Profits
description:
A lovely realm to see, people to meet, cultures to explore, but you don't care for any of that, there is money to be made! Take the reigns of the Goblin arms syndicate, sell your dubious goods to warriors in need. Spread turmoil across the land and exploit it for profit.


How to Play - acquire as many Coins as you can before the chaos gets out of control. - Buy new factories by clicking on them, these will grant you new goods next turn. - end your turn after assigning your goods by hitting the bell in the bottom left corner.
